msbt.message: Yo! Should I model this look right now? I mean, it's a real !
Go for it!
Maybe later.
Let's see what we're working with here. Whoa, ! Honestly, I don't know if I can pull that off. What do you think?
Try it on and find out!
Try it on later, maybe.
Waitthis is EXACTLY the same as what I'm already wearing.<10_4 /> YES! I've been wanting a backup.
Alright, here we go. You ready for this?
Yeah, I should probably wait for ideal lighting and a seven-way mirror. Good call.
Yeah? Well, here goes nothing
You're right. You'd probably get bored watching me model this for three hours anyway.
Well? How do I look?
Lookin' good!
Hmm...
You really mean it?<10_4 /> Well, if it has the seal of approval, I'm happy!
Yikes, that bad? I better change before the paparazzi captures me in this look forever!
No, no, it's OK.
Good idea.
Hmmreally? I guess if you say so, I'll take your word for it.Maybe it just needs a little test-wear around the island. Strut my stuff, -style!
Ahh! I can't believe I even tried it on in the first place.Listenâ€”this never happened, OK?<10_4 /> THIS. NEVER. HAPPENED!
Althoughmost truly great fashion isn't appreciated in its time.<10_4 /> Nah, this isn't it.
I just love the material. Leave it to to pick out something so cozy.
It kinda makes me feel as bubbly as herself!
I should have known that would pick out something so stylish
You know, can be a little abrasive at times, but she does have a good eye
I still can't believe that picked this out for me!
To think picked this out, and it's not even made of spandex!
Of course, the question isdid just find this buried somewhere in his closet?
It's light, it's fresh, it's on-trend It must be from . That guy really knows his stuff.
How could I stay mad at after this? I'd better go apologize too.
You know, I really let myself get carried away with . She can bea lot. But I should swallow my pride and go apologize to her.Maybe I'll swallow some first, with a little
I should really go apologize to after allIt was so nice of her to pick out such a perfect present for me.
Even after our knock-down, drag-out fight, she's still thinking about me. That really says a lot. I should definitely apologize to before she changes her mind!
You're probably wonderinghow did I ever get in a fight with , right? I think it was over , honestly. Anyway, I should go apologize.
I guess I pushed too far this time. I thought he was all about pushing his limits! Ah, well. He did his part, so now I should go apologize. Guess I better do some crunches first. Ha HA!
Wow, must have been feeling really bad to actually go and get me a gift. I should go apologize to him in person and listen to one of his weird rambling stories for good measure.
I realize now that I've been taking for granted. He even got me an apology gift. What a guy.
Of course, I'm just happy that was thinking of me. It's all about the gesture!
The actual gift isn't as important as the fact that sent one at all. YepI really need to grow up and go apologize to her. Puttin' on my big pants right now!
So I guess this is how plans on making things right with me. Well, fashion heals all wounds! I'll go apologize.
I think I finally see the point that was trying to make I should go apologize right away. It's not like us to be in a fight like this.
Got the message loud and clear, . I guess I wasn't really thinking of her feelings. Yep, this clinches it. I've got to go apologize.
We all know that isn't the best with words But this speaks pretty clearly for him. I'm gonna go apologize to the poor guy.
It really says something that took time out of his busy workout schedule to do this. I should buff up my own feelings and go apologize to him.
isn't exactly known for being polite, so it really says something that he sent this. I've gotta go apologize to him before he changes his mind!
It wasn't quite what I'd normally expect from , but the message is clear. I've gotta go apologize. Who could stay mad at a cool guy like that?
